Package org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.notifications

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RegisterRoleChangeListener
    Message sent from the listener of Role Change messages to register itself to the Role Change Notifier The Listener could be in a separate ActorSystem and hence this message needs to be Serializable
    RegisterRoleChangeListenerReply
    Reply message sent from a RoleChangeNotifier to the Role Change Listener Can be sent to a separate actor system and hence should be made serializable.
    RoleChanged
    Role Change message initiated internally from the Raft Actor when a the behavior/role changes.
    RoleChangeNotification
    Notification message representing a Role change of a cluster member Roles generally are Leader, Follower and Candidate.
    RoleChangeNotifier
    The RoleChangeNotifier is responsible for receiving Raft role change messages and notifying the listeners (within the same node), which are registered with it.
